name: Dragonspine Spear
desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

values.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>95%</color> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>240%</color> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has an <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>110%</color> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>280%</color> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>90%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>125%</color> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>320%</color> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>140%</color> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>360%</color> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.
